page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The main local centres of employment for our block are Rolls Royce Motor Company and Crewe Works where engines are made for British Railways trains. The shops and businesses in and around Crewe employ a large number of our residents as do County Council establishments. A fairly high proportion of men commute daily further afield to centres such as Stoke-on-Trent and Manchester for their employment. More and more jobs involve the use of computers. There is also a high proportion of teachers living in our unit. Women work mostly on a part-time basis but a growing number are seeking full-time emplyment. These jobs tend to be locally-based, and secretarial work is still popular among women. Unemployment in the area is not high.
